profile:
(403)-874-3000 -  "Floor Removal Experts"................................
Dustless Tile & Thinset Removal  - Commercial & Residential.

WE WORK FOR:
- FLOORING COMPANIES
- RENOVATION CONTRACTORS 
- HOME OWNERS
- BUSINESS OWNERS

Hardwood Floor Removal | Tile Removal | Carpet Removal | Marmoleum Removal | Linoleum Removal | Kitchen Renovation | Bathroom Renovation | Concrete Grinding & Leveling | VCT Removal | 

All removed surfaces will be environmentally disposed of and you will left with a Reno-Ready Floor for your new surface application.

Dust is Deadly and could cause Silicosis (Lung Cancer) . We won't show up with inferior equipment. Our equipment is custom & 3rd part Hepa Certified. We have hospital grade vacs that get the job done right & faster than standard methods. You won't even know we were there but will glad we were!

No need to have to dust your home of office every day for the next year or send yoru clothes out for cleaning. Dust is the leading reason for failure in telecommunication equipment, office equipment  & computers. We capture the dust you cannot see (less than .3 Microns) and is the most dangerous dust to your health.

Home Owners, Businesses & Contractors Love Us!
